mapper.sql: id, police_id, year, month, total_num, conduct_num, handling_case_num, duty_num, train_num, social_contact_num, amily_evaluation_num, health_num, creation_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into risk_report_record (id, police_id, year, month, total_num, conduct_num, handling_case_num, duty_num, train_num, social_contact_num, amily_evaluation_num, health_num, creation_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{conductNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{handlingCaseNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dutyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trainNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{socialContactNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{amilyEvaluationNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{healthNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update risk_report_record
police_id = #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_num = #{totalNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
conduct_num = #{conductNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
handling_case_num = #{handlingCaseNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
duty_num = #{dutyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
train_num = #{trainNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
social_contact_num = #{socialContactNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amily_evaluation_num = #{amilyEvaluationNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
health_num = #{healthNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update risk_report_record set police_id = #{policeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_num = #{totalNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, conduct_num = #{conductNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, handling_case_num = #{handlingCaseNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, duty_num = #{dutyNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, train_num = #{trainNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, social_contact_num = #{socialContactNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, amily_evaluation_num = #{amilyEvaluationNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, health_num = #{healthNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from (select a.*,b.name,b.head_image as headImage, c.name as departmentName,d.position_name as positionName, round(ifnull((a.total_num-e.total_num)/e.total_num*100,0),2) as riskRate, e.total_num as lastTotalNum from risk_report_record a left join user b on b.police_id=a.police_id left join department c on c.id=b.department_id left join police_position d on d.id=b.position_id left join (select * from risk_report_record where DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m')=#{lastDateTime}) e on e.police_id=a.police_id where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(a.creation_date, '%Y-%m')=#{dateTime}
and (a.police_id like '%${keyWords}%' or b.name like '%${keyWords}%') ) as t
